sentences.en: An entirely rigid system is impractical.
sentences.cn: 一套完全死板的体制是不实际的.

sentences.en: Geniuses are supposed to be eccentric and hopelessly impractical.
sentences.cn: 天才通常都被认为行为古怪而且毫无实践能力。

sentences.en: He considered it womanish and impractical.
sentences.cn: 他认为这是自作多情,不足为训.

sentences.en: He rejected my suggestion as impractical.
sentences.cn: 他以不切实际为由拒绝了我的建议.

sentences.en: His ideas are, in the main, impractical.
sentences.cn: 他的主意大体 说来 很不实际.

sentences.en: James was a foolish man, full of impractical plans.
sentences.cn: 詹姆斯是个愚蠢的人，满脑子都是不切实际的计划。

sentences.en: The business proposition was rejected as impractical.
sentences.cn: 这个生意上的提议因不适用而未被采纳.

sentences.en: The design was scrubbed at the drawing board stage as being impractical.
sentences.cn: 这一设计图纸还未画出就被认为不实用而遭废弃.

sentences.en: The heavy damping makes it impractical to read gravity directly from the displacement of the beam.
sentences.cn: 高阻尼不能使其直接从横臂的位移读出重力值.

sentences.en: The ideas of a visionary may seem impractical to us.
sentences.cn: 在我们看来,空想家的观念好像不切实际.

sentences.en: The implementation of digital equipments would have been otherwise impractical due to size and cost.
sentences.cn: 受体积和成本的限制,制造这些数字设备是不现实的.

sentences.en: The mathematician is an impractical person who can't even boil an egg.
sentences.cn: 那位数学家是个什么事都不会做的人,连煮蛋都不会.

sentences.en: The overlapping window concept is good, but its execution is impractical in the real world.
sentences.cn: 重叠窗口的概念是好的, 但在真实世界中却不太实际.

sentences.en: The road toll scheme was dismissed as impractical.
sentences.cn: 公路收费计划由于不切实际而遭到否定。

sentences.en: To expect automatic protection from the police is impractical.
sentences.cn: 期望警方自动提供保护是不现实的.

sentences.en: When dealing with a larger number of items, using of cards may become impractical.
sentences.cn: 当涉及大量项目时, 使用卡片的方式就变得很麻烦了.

sentences.en: When stalking subjects, a tripod is impractical.
sentences.cn: 潜步跟踪目标时，用三脚架是不切实际的。

words.tran_cn: 没用地；不能实行地；无法可想地
固执；无法实施；不能实施的事项
不切实际；不切实际之事

trans.tran_cn: 不切实际的，无用的，不现实的，不善做实际工作的
trans.tran_en: not sensible or possible for practical reasons
